Language.name: English

Text.key: New version do you want to download it? Recommended!

Language.Text:
There is a new version of MegaDownloader.
It is recommended to update.
Do you want to download it?

Text.key: New version do you want to download it?

Language.Text: There is a new version of MegaDownloader. Click here to download it.
Are you sure you want to exit?
There are files being extracted. If you exit now, the extracted files can be corrupted and you will have to extract them manually.

Text.key: Do you want to delete the element(s)?

Language.Text: Do you want to delete the element(s)?

Text.key: Note: files will NOT be deleted

Language.Text: Note: files will NOT be deleted.

Text.key: No valid URLs have been inserted

Language.Text: No valid URLs have been inserted

Text.key: Can not add remote links without a default path

Language.Text: Links can't be added remotely without a default path

Text.key: This screen lets you see the status of the files pending of extraction

Language.Text: This screen lets you see the status of the files pending of extraction

Text.key: if automatic extraction option is enabled

Language.Text: if automatic extraction option is enabled

Insert the Pre-Shared Keys to download files uploaded with this option. If the key is valid, you will be able to download files even without the private key.. Insert one key per line, and be careful not to insert extra white spaces!
No valid links have been inserted
Invalid package name, if you choose 'Create directory', a directory with that name will be created, so it is necessary to specify it.

Text.key: Can change file path if not downloaded

Language.Text: File path can be changed if download hasn't started. If it has, the change is not possible.

If you change the package path, the download path of all pending files will be changed. Path of files already being downloaded won't be changed. If you change the option 'Automatic extraction', it will apply to all files in the package.

Text.key: In case of error, retry the download each

Language.Text: In case of error, retry the download each

Text.key: Note: for advanced users only. Dont touch anything if you arent sure

Language.Text: Note: for advanced users only. Don't touch anything if you aren't sure.

Text.key: You must configure user and password

Language.Text: You must configure an user and a password

This option 'Watch online' lets you watch online videos.
If the link is a valid video file (avi, mkv, flv, mp4, etc), you have the option to watch it using VLC Player.
You must have the streaming server activated and the VLC Player path defined. You can activate this feature from the 'Configuration' screen, under the tab 'Streaming'.
Once configurated, click on the 'Watch online' button for watching it streaming on your PC.
Streaming server not activated. You can activate this feature from the 'Configuration' screen, under the tab 'Streaming'.
VLC path not defined. You can define it from the 'Configuration' screen, under the tab 'Streaming'.

Enter the video URL in the textbox 'MEGA URL link'.
An address will be generated in the textbox 'Streaming URL link'. You can use this address on any player that supports streaming in order to start watching it.
If you have VLC Player and have defined its path in MegaDownloader's configuration, click on 'Start VLC' to start watching the video.
Please note that you may need to wait some seconds before the streaming starts.

Text.key: Web server and streaming server ports must be different

Language.Text: The streaming server port and the web server port can not be the same.

The Streaming server lets you watch online videos from MEGA.CO.NZ.
To use the streaming server, check the 'Use streaming server' option and select a port. It must have a value between 1024 and 65535 (recommended between 49152 and 65535). You can select any, taking into account that is can not be used by any other program. By default the port is 54321.
Once the streaming server has been activated, you can go to the menu and select the option 'Streaming' / 'Watch online'. Enter MEGA link and a new streaming link will be generated. This link has to be entered into a multimedia player in order to watch the video.
Please take into account that MegaDownloader is not a multimedia player. This option lets you stream the data from MEGA, but you will need a player to see the video and audio, for example VLC Player. In order to launch VLC easily, enter the VLC installation path in the 'VLC path' option in this screen.

Text.key: Do you want to leave the default path empty?

Language.Text: Do you want to leave the default path empty?

Text.key: Disk buffer or package size values are not correct

Language.Text: Disk buffer or package size values are not correct.

Text.key: Disk buffer size must be greater than package size

Language.Text: Disk buffer size must be greater than package size.

Text.key: Connection number values are incorrect or too high

Language.Text: Connection values are incorrect or too high.

Text.key: Must specify the retry period, and this value must be between %A and %B

Language.Text: The retry period must be specified, and its value must be between %A and %B.
Server port is not valid. It must have a value between 1024 y 65535 (recommended between 49152 y 65535).

Text.key: The value for interrumpting the session must be between 0 and %A. A value of 0 means that session is not interrupted

Language.Text: The time out value session must be between 0 and %A. A value of 0 means that session is not interrupted.

Text.key: The template path is not valid

Language.Text: The template path is not valid.

Text.key: The web server password must have at least %A characters

Language.Text: The web server password must have at least %A characters.

Text.key: Error deleting local files - Path: %PATH% - Error: %ERROR%

Language.Text: Error deleting local file '%PATH%'. If the file is in use by another process, you may have to delete it manually. Error details: %ERROR%

Text.key: If no user and password is specified, downloads will be made as an anonymous user

Language.Text: If no user and password is specified, downloads will be made as an anonymous user.

Text.key: User and password is not used yet

Language.Text: At this moment the user and password is not used (leave it in blank if you want). All downloads are made as an anonymous user. In the future this fields may be used.

The values indicated will be the maximum accepted values. For example if you select 3 connections per file and 5 parallel downloads, there will be a maximum of 15 connections. These values will be shown in the main screen, in the form A/B, where: A is the number of connections per file. B is the parallel download number.

Using this option, the computer will turn off when the downloads have finished correctly. In case there are download errors, the computer will turn off depending on the option 'In case of error, retry each'. If it is checked, the computer won't turn off because will try to reconnect.
NOTE: This option is not saved, you have to activate it each time you start the application. In this way the computer won't turn off accidentally when a download finishes.

Text.key: Save and use last conf explanation

Language.Text: When activating this option, the add link screen will remember the last configuration used since the application started, instead of showing the default configuration. Example: your default path is the Desktop. You want to download 8 packages and leave it in a different path. Instead of adding 8 packages and changing the path each time, you will change it once and the other 7 will remember the last used configuration. Please note that the package name is not remembered. When the application closes, this configuration is also lost.

Text.key: You have to restart the application for the language change to take effect

Language.Text: You have to restart the application for the language change to take effect.

Text.key: Please take into consideration the following

Language.Text: Please take into consideration the following
Error, you have to connect again: session expired.

Text.key: Paste your MEGA Url(s) and the encoded Url(s) will appear under the Encoded Url box.

Language.Text: Enter MEGA's URL(s), and the encoded Url(s) will appear under the 'Encoded URL' box.

Welcome to MegaDownloader.
This non-official application is designed to help you downloading files from MEGA.
Do you accept MEGA terms of use? Please click on 'Help' to read them.

Text.key: Must configure at least one account

Language.Text: You must configure at least one account.
Account modified successfully. Remember to save the configuration or the changes will be discarded.
Account added successfully. Remember to save the configuration or the changes will be discarded.
Account deleted successfully. Remember to save the configuration or the changes will be discarded.

Text.key: Do you want to delete this account?

Language.Text: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
Account data is managed in the tab 'Accounts'.
If you check this option, you will see the password when typing it, in order to avoid errors. However once it is saved, it won't be displayed for security even if you check this option.

Text.key: There is a DLC being processed, please wait

Language.Text: There is a DLC/ELC being processed, please wait

Text.key: The DLC could not be loaded. Reason: %REASON

Language.Text: The DLC/ELC could not be loaded: %REASON

Text.key: The DLC has no valid Mega links

Language.Text: The DLC/ELC doesn't have any valid MEGA link.
Thanks for using this non-official download application for MEGA.CO.NZ
MegaDownloader is not related with Mega.co.nz - All trademarks are property of their respective owners.

Text.key: %NAME for helping with MEGA criptographic system

Language.Text: %NAME for helping with MEGA criptographic system.
All users who have collaborated testing the application.

Text.comment: The credits for your translation, something like 'John Doe for translating this program to Klingon'

Language.Text:
An 'ELC' container (Encoded Link Container) offers protection against the link copy or report, allowing to share MEGA link in a community validating it with an user and key. In this way, it is necessary to have a valid account in the community in order to download the links in the ELC.
Note: The community has to give the 'ELC' account data (URL, user, API-Key).

Text.key: Paste your MEGA Url(s), select your ELC account, and click on Generate ELC

Language.Text: Paste your MEGA Url(s), select your ELC account, and click on 'Generate ELC'.

Text.key: This is your ELC link. You can also create an ELC file clicking on Save file

Language.Text: This is your ELC link. You can also create an ELC file clicking on 'Save file'.

Text.key: Please select a valid ELC account

Language.Text: Please select a valid ELC account.

Text.key: There is an ELC being processed, please wait

Language.Text: There is an ELC being processed, please wait.

Text.key: No ELC accounts configured. Go to Configuration in order to add an ELC account

Language.Text: No ELC accounts configured. Go to Configuration in order to add an ELC account.

Text.key: The ELC path is not valid

Language.Text: The ELC path is not valid.
This data is provided by the community, indicates the validation URL.

The alias is an identificative name that will be displayed in the list on the left, and in the 'ELC generator' screen. You can put anything you want (or leave it blank), and can change it at any moment. Just remember that it can not be repeated.

You can have one account marked as 'default', marked with a '[*]' in the list of the left. It will appear selected by default in the 'ELC generator' screen. If you mark another account as default, the previous default account will be unmarked.

Text.key: ELC Account not found. You need a valid ELC Account configured for this ELC.

Language.Text: ELC Account not found. You need a valid ELC Account configured for this ELC.

Text.key: The link is a folder with %NUM files. Now only the first will be used, if you want to use all, import the link into the streaming library.

Language.Text: The link is a folder with %NUM files. Now only the first will be used, if you want to use all, import the link into the streaming library.

Text.key: The ELC contains %NUM files. Now only the first will be used, if you want to use all, import the ELC into the streaming library.

Language.Text: The ELC contains %NUM files. Now only the first will be used, if you want to use all, import the ELC into the streaming library.

Text.key: Do you want to import the configuration for the following ELC accounts?

Language.Text: Do you want to import the configuration for the following ELC accounts?

If the file is password protected, you can insert the password here and it will be used when extracting the file. If not, just leave it empty. Please note that only basic support for ZIP and RAR files is currently provided. Multipart RARs are not yet supported.

Text.key: The image was created successfully in {0} ms

Language.Text: The image was created successfully in {0} ms

Text.key: No hidden links were found. Please check the image and the password

Language.Text: No hidden links were found. Please check the image and the password.

Text.key: Steganography is the art and science ... SAVE

Language.Text:
Steganography is the art and science of hiding information inside another message. Using steganography, MegaDownloader allows you to hide one or more links inside a JPEG image.
To use this option, you just have to do these simple 3 steps:
1) Enter the links you want to hide 2) Select the input image you want to use, and the output image you want to generate. 3) Optionally specify a password to increment the links security.

Text.key: Steganography is the art and science ... LOAD

Language.Text:
Steganography is the art and science of hiding information inside another message. Using steganography, MegaDownloader allows you to hide one or more links inside a JPEG image.
With this option you can load links from a JPEG image that already contains one or more links. Please note that you can generate images with the "Steganography" option under the menu "Options".
To retrieve links, you just have to do these simple 2 steps:
1) Select the image that contains the hidden links from your disk, or enter the URL. 2) Specify the password used to hide the links (if there is no password just leave it empty).

Text.key: Enter one or more MEGA links to be hidden

Language.Text: Enter one or more MEGA links to be hidden.

Text.key: Select an existing image as Input image ...

Language.Text: Select an existing image as "Input image", and then select or create a new JPEG image as the "Output image". The input image can be an existing file or an image URL.

Text.key: Optionally, you can specify the JPEG quality and a password. If not, just leave it empty

Language.Text: Optionally, you can specify the JPEG quality and a password. If not, just leave it empty.
If you check this option, the links will be visible to the user that retrieves them. If not, he will be able to download the links but not see them.

Text.key: For more information about stegano click here
Select an existing image as Input image, or enter the image URL

Language.Text: Select an existing image as "Input image", or enter the image URL.

Text.key: If the image has a password, enter it. If not, just leave it empty

Language.Text: If the image has a password, enter it. If not, just leave it empty.

Text.key: Warning: image too small, maybe the data is corrupted

Language.Text: Warning: image too small, maybe the data is corrupted.

Text.key: Warning: The image output was created but the data verification failed. This may happen if the image is too small, try with a bigger image

Language.Text: Warning: The image output was created but the data verification failed. This may happen if the image is too small, try with a bigger image.
